txt.en: 'The apprentices will make copies of this helm until I can't tell the difference between theirs and yours!'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
The leader of the Metalsmith's Guild has asked you to forge a helm the apprentices can use as a model for learning.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern helm.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern helm
The Guild Leader silently holds aloft what appears to be a helm. He points to where eye holes should be before dropping the not-helm on the floor.\n\n'Please help.'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern helm
The Guild Leader silently holds aloft what appears to be a helm. He points to where eye holes should be before dropping the not-helm on the floor.\n\n'Please help.'
Turn in a guild-pattern helm ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hávar
'The apprentices will make copies of this helm until I can't tell the difference between theirs and yours!'
Talk to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern helm ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
